guildProperty.name: bot name
guildProperty.updateMessage: You can now call me %s. My new name may be used as command prefix.
guildProperty.description: Name of the bot that matches the nickname and may be used as command prefix.

guildProperty.name: prefix
guildProperty.description: The one character long command prefix to start commands with.

guildProperty.name: playback notification
guildProperty.description: Toggle sending "Now playing..." messages when a track starts.

guildProperty.name: color
guildProperty.description: Change the color for bot messages (except for success and error messages).

guildProperty.name: auto pause
guildProperty.description: Toggle the bot automatically pausing playback and leaving the channel when everyone leaves. The bot will stop and leave when being alone for an hour.

guildProperty.name: default volume
guildProperty.description: Change the default volume of the bot.

guildProperty.name: default source
guildProperty.updateMessage: Set the default search source to %s
guildProperty.description: The default source to search for tracks when no source was explicitly specified.

guildProperty.name: default list source
guildProperty.updateMessage: Set the default list search source to %s
guildProperty.description: The default source to search for playlists when no source was explicitly specified.

guildProperty.name: argument prefix
guildProperty.updateMessage: Set the argument prefix to '%1$s'. Commands now look like this: $aiode play %1$sspotify %1$salbum meteora. The default prefix "$" still works as a fallback. All presets containing argument prefixes have been updated.
guildProperty.description: The one character long prefix to start arguments with.

guildProperty.name: message timeout
guildProperty.updateMessage: Set the amount of seconds after which temporary messages are deleted to %s. (0 means no timeout)
guildProperty.description: The amount of seconds after which temporary messages like success notifications are deleted. A timeout of 0 means there is no timeout and messages aren't deleted automatically.

guildProperty.name: default channel
guildProperty.description: The default channel for messages that are not triggered by commands where the specific channel cannot be determined (e.g. update notifications).
guildProperty.updateMessageScript: def message_fmt = "Set default channel to "; def text_channel = guild.getTextChannelById(value); if (text_channel != null) { return message_fmt + text_channel.getName(); } else { return message_fmt + "[DELETED CHANNEL]" }

guildProperty.name: enable scripting
guildProperty.description: Enable the commands in the scripting category and scripted interceptors / finalizers.
